[[File:Charging Bull statue.jpg|thumb|300px|''Charging Bull'', Arturo Di Modica. [[New York City]]]]
 
'''Market sentiment''' is the general prevailing attitude of [[investor]]s as to anticipated [[market trends|price development]] in a market. This attitude is the accumulation of a variety of [[fundamental analysis|fundamental]] and [[technical analysis|technical]] factors, including price history, economic reports, seasonal factors, and national and world events.
'''Market sentiment''' is the general prevailing attitude of [[investor]]s as to anticipated [[market trends|price development]] in a market. This attitude is the accumulation of a variety of [[fundamental analysis|fundamental]] and [[technical analysis|technical]] factors, including price history, economic reports, seasonal factors, and national and world events.
